seed_pair.target: Conozco a un hombre viejo que quería pedir ayuda.
seed_pair.known: I know an old man who wanted to ask for help.

S0221: Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.
I watched the football and then I watched a film.
S0222: Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.
He's trying to tell me what he wants
S0223: He's going to ask you tomorrow.
S0225: Te daría una respuesta si pudiera.
He would give you an answer if he could.
S0226: The man is trying to help me.
S0227: Ese hombre va a decirme algo nuevo.
That man is going to tell me something new.
S0228: Ese hombre acaba de empezar a practicar el habla.
That man has just started to practise speaking.
S0229: Esa mujer te ayudaría si pudiera.
That woman would help you if she could.
S0230: Conozco a un hombre joven que quiere trabajar contigo.
I know a young man who wants to work with you.
